overview: Jasawar (Gurdas Mann) a lawyer from Punjab who comes to Canada to work as a lawyer, but is unable to work as a lawyer and does other jobs instead. He falls in love with Bhumika Chawla but he meets an accident and plots a way to get easy money along with his helping hand Khanna, He later finds out that the driver he was suing was the uncle of his lover yet he continues to sue.
title: Yaariyan
